rukus.text: qasam hai anjeer ki aur zaytoon ki
aur us aman waale shahar ki
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko behetreen surath mein paida kiya
phir ose nicho se nicha kar diya
lekin jo log imaan laaye aur (phir) nek amal kiye to, un ke liye aisa ajr hai jo kabhi qatam na hoga
pas tujhe ab roze jaza ke jhutlaane par kaun si cheez aamada karti hai
kya Allah taâ€™ala (sab) haakimo ka haakim nahi hai
